title: B4 want a Dou Partner
body:
Hi
i have been wanting to play with some who is friendly, has decent mic and has Skype ( or any other programs alike)
i mainly play mid, jg or adc

replies.body: Hey I'm currently bronze 4, honestly my mic is subpar but I'm getting a new one soon haha, I'm not that fussed about skill, I'm playing for fun, but I just want someone that has common sense! Add me if you want a game :)
